mapper.insert: insert into request(name, description, type, price, fintime, school, holder_id,form_id)values (#{name},#{description},#{type},#{price},#{fintime},#{school},#{holder_id},#{form_id})
mapper.update: update request set state= #{stateAfter} ,worker_id= #{userid} where reqid=#{reqid} and state=#{stateNow}
update request set state =#{stateAfter} where reqid=#{reqid} and state=#{stateNow}
mapper.select: select reqid, name, type, price, fintime, state, school from request where school=#{school} and state=#{state} order by reqid DESC
select reqid, name, type, price, fintime, state, school from request where school=#{school} and state=#{state} and type=#{type} order by reqid DESC
select * from request where holder_id=#{userid} order by reqid DESC
select * from request where worker_id=#{userid} order by reqid DESC
select holder_id from request where reqid=#{reqid}
select type from request where reqid=#{reqid}
select * from request where match(name,description) against ('+${s1} >${s2} >${s3} >${s4} >${s5}' in boolean mode) and school=#{school} and state=#{state} order by reqid DESC;
select form_id from request where reqid =#{reqid}
